form.official-title: Recognizing the teachers of the United States for their contributions to the development and progress of our country.

whereas.text: Whereas education is the foundation of the current and future strength of the United States;

Whereas the purpose ofNational Teacher Appreciation Week, which is May 6, 2013, through May 10, 2013, is to raise public awareness of the important contributions of teachers and to promote greater respect and understanding for the teaching profession;
Whereas the teachers of the United States play an important role in preparing children to be positive and contributing members of society; and
Whereas students, schools, communities, and a number of organizations host teacher appreciation events in recognition ofNational Teacher Appreciation Week: Now, therefore, be it

paragraph.text: promotes the profession of teaching; and
recognizes students, parents, school administrators, and public officials who participate in teacher appreciation events duringNational Teacher Appreciation Week.
